halfedge
Class HalfEdgeDataStructure<V extends Node,E extends Edge<V,E,F>,F extends Node>

java.lang.Object
  halfedge.HalfEdgeDataStructure<V,E,F>
Type Parameters:
E - The edge class this graph should work with
F - The face class this graph should work with
V - The vertex class this graph should work with
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class HalfEdgeDataStructure<V extends Node,E extends Edge<V,E,F>,F extends Node>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A Generic Half Edge Data Structure

Author:
offbeata

removeFace

public boolean removeFace(F face)
Remove a face from this halfedge data structure. Does nothing if face is null or does not belong to this halfedge data structure. Otherwise, edges with face as left face will have null as left face after execution of this method.

Parameters:
face - the face to remove.
Returns:
true if this halfedge data structure changed due to this operation, false otherwise.

removeEdge

public boolean removeEdge(E edge)
Remove an edge from this halfedge data structure. Does nothing if edge is null or does not belong to this halfedge data structure. Otherwise, edge will not be linked with any edges, vertices, faces after execution of this method.

Parameters:
edge - the edge to remove.
Returns:
true if this halfedge data structure changed due to this operation, false otherwise.

removeEdgeAndOppositeEdge

public boolean removeEdgeAndOppositeEdge(E edge)
Removes both edge and edge.getOppositeEdge if not null

Parameters:
edge -
Returns:
true if this halfedge data structure changed due to this operation, false otherwise.

removeVertex

public boolean removeVertex(V vertex)
Remove a vertex from this halfedge data structure. Does nothing if vertex is null or does not belong to this halfedge data structure. Otherwise, edges with vertex as target vertex will have null as target vertex after execution of this method.

Parameters:
vertex - the vertex to remove.
Returns:
true if this halfedge data structure changed due to this operation, false otherwise.

Returns:
an edge e with left face f, or null if none exists.
